title: Creating Serious Ranked 5's Team. Silver 2+ (NO EXCEPTIONS).
body:
Hello people my name is Nick also known as xxxgunz4nickxxx (Getting Name Change Soon 11.3k ip) and I am creating a fairly serious ranked team. I currently am gold 4 in my promos 1-1. I main jungle and love gragas/voli the most. I have a fairly small champion pool but I can get by just fine. Now for this ranked team I plan on making it fairly serious with 3 practice days a week (Possible more). Now I am looking for younger people that do not have jobs, college or anything in the way. I Admit I do not have a life but looking for people almost on the same boat. Some days I understand missing a practice but give a 3 day+ notice if possible. We will take vacations off like the 4th of July and other stuff. This team will participate in lower elo tournaments for golds/plats. There is a application and rules you will have to follow to stay on the team.

OP.GG Guide:
This is for if you do not know what op.gg is. It it tells stats of players so I want it in your application so I do not have to go through each one and type it in. Helps when going through countless applications. So go to http://na.op.gg/ and type your name in. Then just copy the link and put it under the op.gg part in the application.

Rules: btw if google docs list doesn't work please say. Will fix.
- Be Able to attend ALL times in EST and I am not converting over other timezones. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IWh5jqt80ejeN745MYelrqibfJGINuImAoz6rb7ORsQ/pubhtml 
- Do not rage. Rager's bring down the attitude of the game. Also try not to be silent during a bad game.
- If you can not make a practice please tell me 3 days beforehand and rarely miss them.
- Have CURSE AND RAIDCALL available. We will be using curse at the start but will move over to raidcall possibly.
- Be able to take criticism and talk with the team about theirs. Don't blame but give them advice.
- Have at least 80 ranked games played this season 30+ in the role (May vary on lane)
- Have internet with NO LAG (99% of the time) if you lag on the first days your automatically off the team.
- Main the role. 2 roles max on the applicaiton
- If you can take a loss leave now. You must be able to take a loss even if its the 2nd game. Unless there is a clear problem with a player the first 5 games will be played with the same roster and will make changes if needed after.
- Silver 2+ Rank NO EXCEPTIONS

Application:
Role:
Rank:
Age:
What you want to be called:
Time Zone (Team TimeZone is EST when talking about scheduling and such):
Champion Pool:
Strengths:
Weakness(YOU HAVE LOTS):
op.gg:
curse/raidcall?(yes/no):
You can go along with the schedule 99% of the time?(yes/no):
Have you read all the rules and agree to them?(yes/no):
Days you are not available(Consistently):

Reposting from http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/YRbU6oyd-creating-serious-ranked-5s-team-silver-2-no-exceptions
but please put replies down below.
